<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGEN: do NOT edit in this block -->

**command: `/create`**

**quick ref:**
> /create [id|filename] [bx] [by] [bz]

**description:**

```
 create item, entity, block, etc. 
/create filename.x
/create 20012 				create rail car at player position. 
```

<!-- END_AUTOGEN-->
建造项目，方块，物体；给予坐标数值。
